Story:

Sir Blackmoon is a young mage who is part of an ancient dynasty of mages who have fathomed all kinds of magic for generations. The necromancy has led to side effects, which is why Sir Blackmoon is now close to death. Therefore, a reaper from the netherworld has set out to harvest Sir Blackmoon's soul. Sir Blackmoon has set out to find a way to escape the Reaper.

2D Platformer
